author: Ilias Marinakis
description: An unlikely combination of big rich flavours, but when served ice-cold this is either a very interesting Mediterranean aperitivo or a palate cleansing digestivo.
name: She's Like
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
